column4: Fitch Solutions: Xerox CDS Reach Widest Level in Four Years
column5: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  February 04 (Fitch) The cost of credit protection for Xerox  Corporation continues to rise as steadily widening credit default swap (CDS)  spreads will attest  according to Fitch Solutions in its latest CDS Case Study  Snapshot. Five-year CDS spreads on Xerox widened 31% over the past week and are 244% wider  compared to levels seen at this time one year ago.  Credit protection on Xerox's  debt is now pricing in 'BB' territory
